title: Galaxy Digital Looking to Buy More Crypto Bankruptcy Assets After Deal to Sell FTX's Coins: FT
description: Mike Novogratz's firm is also interested in companies FTX invested in as a venture capital provider.

title: Unofficial Arweave forking plans draw community controversy
description:
A hard fork proposed by Arweave’s largest layer-2 solution, Irys, is allegedly in the making.

Irys, a prominent layer-2 network within the Arweave ecosystem, allegedly has plans to fork the Arweave network with the intent to “drop the dataset and reset the token supply,” according to a Dec. 17 post by Arweave founder Sam Williams.

He alleges that despite the existence of a safe upgrade mechanism with Arweave, Irys developers plan to proceed with a hard fork that “appears to be a play motivated by greed.” The Arweave founder wrote:

In a rebuttal post the same day, Irys developers stated, “Are we developing new provenance tech? You bet your ass we are,” accusing Arweave developers of “active censorship” in response to alleged efforts to “deplatform Irys from Arweave.” Developers added, “Stay tuned to this space; we have plenty of powerful new features we’re thinking through, and we can’t wait to share them.”

Read more

title: Record-breaking day for Bitcoin as transaction fees surge to $24 million
description:
Quick Take Over the past weekend, Bitcoin transaction fees recorded a new milestone. Measured in United States Dollars (USD), Bitcoin experienced the largest single-day spike in fees, reaching approximately $24 million on Dec. 17. This peak surpassed the previous highs of $18 million in May 2023 and $21 million in 2017. Over the past week, […]

The post Record-breaking day for Bitcoin as transaction fees surge to $24 million appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Coinbase files lawsuit against SEC over denied petition
description: Coinbase bid for crypto clarity vs SEC's broad oversight; Coinbase petition sought to curb regulations inhibiting crypto adoption.

title: FTX’s new proposal raises questions amidst bankruptcy proceedings
description: In a recent development in the ongoing bankruptcy proceedings of cryptocurrency exchange FTX, debtors have put forth a new proposal aimed at settling customer claims and concluding the Chapter 11 case.  However, the proposal has left several crucial questions unanswered, sparking concerns among creditors and stakeholders. Incomplete details raise concerns The newly unveiled reorganization plan […]

title: Ark Invest sells significant stake in Coinbase and Grayscale Bitcoin Trust
description: Ark Invest, the investment management firm led by Cathie Wood, has made headlines once again with its recent sale of Coinbase shares and Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) holdings.  According to the latest trade filings, Ark Invest offloaded a total of $59 million worth of Coinbase shares and $15 million of GBTC last week as part […]

title: Galaxy digital’s $24.3M ETH transfer to Binance
description: Cryptocurrency markets experienced a downturn as Ether (ETH) dropped by 1.82%, testing a critical support level at $2,145.  This price decline triggered a substantial transfer of 11,200 ETH, valued at $24.3 million, from Galaxy Digital to Binance, as reported by on-chain tracking platform Lookonchain. In this article, we explore the recent developments in the ETH […]

title: Circle launches EURC stablecoin on Solana
description: Circle, the global financial technology firm, has announced the launch of EURC on the Solana network.

title: Bitcoin Layer Stacks Sets Record With 10,371 Transactions in a Single Block
description:
According to the latest on-chain data, the Bitcoin smart contract layer Stacks achieved a significant milestone by recording 10,371 transactions in block 132,377. This notable number was shared by Chinese journalist Colin Wu and has been attributed to the vigorous activity related to STX20 inscription minting on the Stacks platform. Notably, the surge in transactions […]

The post Bitcoin Layer Stacks Sets Record With 10,371 Transactions in a Single Block appeared first on Coin Edition.
